doc:
Mae Questel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mae_Questel 0 Mae Questel (September 13, 1908 – January 4, 1998) was an American actress and voice actress best known for providing the voices for the animated characters Betty Boop and Olive Oyl. She began in vaudeville, and played occasional small roles in films and television later in her career, most notably the role of Aunt Bethany in 1989's National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation. Mae_Questel ( September_13_,_1908 – January_4_,_1998 ) was an_American_actress_and_voice_actress best known for providing the_voices for the_animated_characters_Betty_Boop and Olive_Oyl . She began in vaudeville , and played occasional_small_roles in films_and_television later in her_career , most_notably the_role of Aunt_Bethany in 1989 's_National_Lampoon 's_Christmas_Vacation .
